rules_text:
Last strike [i](This creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.)[/i]
Whenever a creature dealt combat damage by Cyclopean Sloth this turn dies, exile that creature and put X +1/+1 counters on Cyclopean Sloth, where X is that creature’s power.
notes:
Inspiration — Mapinguari

Mechanical Uniqueness — Canonizing last strike
